message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,500 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500, which is still a great price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000?
